oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Information regarding narrators family. In English after and in Bushman by /han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6052 and 6053, 19. 7671, 26. 8302 rev.). Information about the younger brother of |han=kass'o's grandfather Tsatsi, called !xein (or Dirk). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-19.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dirk (!xein, son of Dootje)
